articles.author: Chris Welch
articles.title: Ultimate Ears announces new Everboom speaker, Boom 4 with USB-C, and more - The Verge
articles.description: UE’s speakers come in new colors and now contain more recycled materials. Plus, they’re all getting a new megaphone feature.

articles.title: World's first epilepsy device fitted in boy's skull | BBC News - BBC News
articles.description: A boy with severe epilepsy has become the first patient in the world to trial a new device fitted in their skull to control seizures. The neurostimulator, wh...
